text:
e="preserve">Thomas Henry Robson (31 July 1944 – 8 October 2020) was an English footballer. He made more than 600 appearances in the Football League playing as a left winger. Robson was born in Gateshead, Tyne and Wear.
Robson's career lasted from the 1950s to 1980s. He played for Northampton Town, Chelsea, Newcastle United, Peterborough United, Nuneaton Borough and Stamford.
In September 2019, Robson was diagnosed with motor neurone disease. He died on 8 October 2020 at the age of 76.
